document.full_text: minnesota twins second baseman tsuyoshi nishioka of japan broke his left leg on a hard slide by new york yankees outfielder nick swisher during their game thursday.
document.title: twins second baseman tsuyoshi nishioka breaks leg on hard slide
lines_and_colors: minnesota twins second baseman tsuyoshi nishioka of japan broke his left leg on a hard slide by new york yankees outfielder nick swisher during their game thursday.
